title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 204.5 - Hearing procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 204.5 - Hearing procedures

State Regulations

Hearings will be conducted in accordance with the procedures
set forth in Part 212 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
204.5

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
